adrFormatAddress: 246 W 80th St #10, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text:
Christine Petrik is an excellent , experienced therapist. Her kind compassionate and connecting way lends to helping her clients with personal growth as well as helping couples achieve a deeper connection and more intimacy. I highly recommend her.
I also recommend Christine  and her husband David Green as presenters of  the "Getting the Love You Want Workshops." They are an excellent team. They  work together to demonstrate and teach tools and skills for helping couples take their relationship to a deeper level and to help couples learn constructive ways to manage conflict leading to connection.

Christine Petrik is an excellent , experienced therapist. Her kind compassionate and connecting way lends to helping her clients with personal growth as well as helping couples achieve a deeper connection and more intimacy. I highly recommend her.
I also recommend Christine  and her husband David Green as presenters of  the "Getting the Love You Want Workshops." They are an excellent team. They  work together to demonstrate and teach tools and skills for helping couples take their relationship to a deeper level and to help couples learn constructive ways to manage conflict leading to connection.

originalText.text: I highly recommend Christine Petrik and Dave Green.  I have known them for many years, have sent many couples to their workshops and to Christine for therapy.  Everyone who attends their workshop or takes part in therapy are so grateful and tell me how much Chris and Dave have helped them.  In addition to being inspirational speakers and workshop leaders, their relationship shows that they live what they teach.
